MainLogic

Class DataProcesser

  • java.lang.Object
    • MainLogic.DataProcesser

  • public class DataProcesser
extends java.lang.Object
    DataProcesser represents the main class of this program, containing all interactions between the Analyzer and User's graphical interface.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet currentSheet
      Excel sheet loaded by the user, that's going to be used in analysis
      private MainWindow gui
      Saves an instance of user's graphical interface
      private static DataProcesser INSTANCE
      Saves an instance to DataProcesser.
      private javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel<DefaultRule> tests
      List of default tests available, as well as user added rules

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description

      DataProcesser's constructor.

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        private static DataProcesser INSTANCE
        Saves an instance to DataProcesser. DataProcesser can only be created or used by accessing this atribute's getter

      • gui

        private MainWindow gui
        Saves an instance of user's graphical interface

      • currentSheet

        private org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet currentSheet
        Excel sheet loaded by the user, that's going to be used in analysis

      • tests

        private javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel<DefaultRule> tests
        List of default tests available, as well as user added rules

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataProcesser

        private DataProcesser()
        DataProcesser's constructor. Set to private, so that instances of DataProcesser can only be created through getInstance() method, avoiding more than one instance being created

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DataProcesser getInstance()
        Returns an instance of DataProcesser if one was created already, if not, it creates a new one
        Returns:
        instance of DataProcesser

      • setCurrentSheet

        public void setCurrentSheet(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet,
                            boolean keepRules)
        Saves an instance of an excel sheet loaded and calls the graphical interface to display it to the user. If user already had a file loaded, it will decide if the current rules are kept or not
        Parameters:
        sheet - instance of loaded sheet to save
        keepRules - controls if rules are kept or not

      • analyseFile

        public void analyseFile(DefaultRule rule)
        Starts an Analyzer thread
        Parameters:
        rule - chosen by the user to control how the analysis will be performed

      • initWindow

        public void initWindow()
        Starts a new Graphical Interface and saves its instance

      • getCurrentSheet

        public org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet getCurrentSheet()
        Returns:
        instance of sheet loaded

      • addToRuleList

        public void addToRuleList(DefaultRule rule)
        Adds a new rule to test list
        Parameters:
        rule - indicates the rule to be added to the list

      • alreadyExists

        public boolean alreadyExists(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if a given rule name already exists in test list
        Parameters:
        name - Rule name
        Returns:
        if there's a rule with the given name

      • saveRules

        public void saveRules(java.lang.String path)
        Saves the current test list to a local file
        Parameters:
        path - path to save file

      • loadRules

        public void loadRules(java.lang.String path)
        Loads a rule containing file, to the current tests' list
        Parameters:
        path - path to load file

      • getRulesList

        public javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel<DefaultRule> getRulesList()
        Returns:
        the current test list
